Advanced hair treatment solutions

Restore your hair naturally and safely

Michael rushed into our clinic one Monday morning, just hours before a crucial board presentation. While getting ready that morning, he noticed an unusual amount of hair on his brush, and panic set in. "I can't afford to lose more hair - I'm only 35," he confided, visibly distressed. Like Michael, thousands face this challenge silently, watching it affect their confidence day after day. Today, thanks to our advanced treatments with Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP) and capillary intradermal therapy, Michael and many others have regained not just their hair, but their self-assurance.

Advanced medical technology for your hair

Discover our revolutionary hair treatments

Two effective solutions for hair loss

1. Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP)

We use your own blood to extract plasma rich in growth factors, naturally stimulating hair follicle regeneration. This treatment:

  1. Stops hair loss from the first session
  2. Promotes new hair growth
  3. Strengthens existing hair
  4. Zero rejection risk as it uses your own plasma

2. Capillary intradermal therapy

We apply a personalized blend of vitamins and minerals directly into the scalp to:

  1. Deeply nourish hair follicles
  2. Improve blood circulation
  3. Stimulate collagen production
  4. Strengthen hair from the root

Schedule your free consultation today and receive a personalized diagnosis along with a treatment plan tailored to your specific needs.

Frequently asked questions about our hair treatments

Sessions last approximately 30-45 minutes. The treatment is minimally invasive and you can resume your activities immediately.

Most of our patients notice a significant reduction in hair loss after the second session. Optimal results are typically observed after 3-4 sessions.

No. We use minimally invasive techniques and local anesthesia to ensure your comfort throughout the procedure. Most patients only describe a slight pressure sensation.

Yes. Both PRP and intradermal therapy are safe procedures using either natural elements from your own body or biocompatible substances. There's no risk of rejection or significant side effects.
